description:
Simple cache for the DNS client. The cache is small to limit memory usage. It has no cache replacement algorithm, other than purging expired entries.

Also doing a minor fix in timeout_test.go, triggered when no Internet connectivity is available.

(Only after writing this I saw your last commit log saying this will be eventually replaced by linking with the native resolver. Let me know if I should revert this changelist - no problem)

messages.text:
Hello rsc (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change.

FYI

Only after writing this I saw your last commit log saying this will be
eventually replaced by linking with the native resolver. Let me know
if I should revert this changelist - no problem.

> Simple cache for the DNS client. The cache is small, to limit memory
> usage. It has no cache replacement algorithm, other than purging expired

>
> Also doing a minor fix in timeout_test.go, triggered when no Internet

Yves Junqueira <http://cetico.org/about>

Sorry for the long delay.
I think that in the next month we will start
linking with the standard system resolver, so
this should become unnecessary.

Thanks.
